```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(linearRegression)
```

To use the function `coefficients`

```{r}
Y <- c(5,7,10,5)
X1 <- c(1,2,3,4)
X2 <- c(2,3,4,6)
X <- cbind(1,X1,X2)
coefficients(X,Y)
```

To use the function `fitted.values`

```{r}
X <- c(1,2,3,4)
Y <- c(2,3,4,5)
fitted_values(X,Y)
```

To use the function `Residuals`

```{r}
Y <- c(4,6,9,13)
X1 <- c(2,3,5,6)
X2 <- c(1,4,3,8)
X <- cbind(1,X1,X2)
Residuals(X,Y)
```
